page.title: 07Local Schools
page.content: {1.Nursery School This school takes in children during the term when they are 4 years old.1 teacher and 2 nursery nurses use 2 old class rooms from the Infant School which have been adapted. {2.Infant School Chaulden opened in January 1956.It now consists of 5 classes and a speech and language unit accommodating 127 children and 6 full time staff. {3.Junior School Chaulden opened as a J.M.I.in 1955 but became a junior school in Jan. 1956.It now consists of 127 children including those attending speech unit which also takes children from Watford and other areas. {4.Junior, Mixed and Infant Pixies Hill opened in September 1963. It now has 5 classes 2 infant and 3 Junior with 111 children.
